SELECT SUM( IF ( t1.`not_compliance_count` = 0, 1, 0 )) AS compliance_count, SUM( IF ( t1.`not_compliance_count` >= 1, 1, 0 )) AS not_compliance_count, t1.`key` AS `key` FROM ( SELECT SUM( compliance_scan_resource_result.`status` ) AS a, SUM( IF ( compliance_scan_resource_result.`status` = 1, 1, 0 )) AS compliance_count, SUM( IF ( compliance_scan_resource_result.`status` = 2, 1, 0 )) AS not_compliance_count
, compliance_scan_resource_result.cloud_account_id as `key`
, compliance_scan_resource_result.resource_type as `key`
, compliance_rule.rule_group_id as `key`
, compliance_rule.id as `key`
FROM compliance_scan_resource_result compliance_scan_resource_result LEFT JOIN compliance_rule compliance_rule ON compliance_rule.id = compliance_scan_resource_result.compliance_rule_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
GROUP BY compliance_scan_resource_result.resource_instance_id, compliance_scan_resource_result.cloud_account_id
GROUP BY compliance_scan_resource_result.resource_instance_id, compliance_scan_resource_result.resource_type
GROUP BY compliance_scan_resource_result.resource_instance_id, compliance_rule.rule_group_id
GROUP BY compliance_scan_resource_result.resource_instance_id, compliance_rule.id
) t1 GROUP BY t1.`key`

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, IFNULL( SUM( IF (t1.`not_compliance_count` = 0, 1, 0)), 0 ) AS compliance_count, IFNULL( SUM( IF (t1.`not_compliance_count` >= 1, 1, 0)), 0 ) AS not_compliance_count FROM (SELECT SUM(compliance_scan_resource_result.`status`) AS a, SUM( IF (compliance_scan_resource_result.`status` = 1, 1, 0)) AS compliance_count, SUM( IF (compliance_scan_resource_result.`status` = 2, 1, 0)) AS not_compliance_count, compliance_scan_resource_result.cloud_account_id AS `key` FROM compliance_scan_resource_result compliance_scan_resource_result LEFT JOIN compliance_rule compliance_rule ON compliance_rule.id = compliance_scan_resource_result.compliance_rule_id ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY compliance_scan_resource_result.resource_instance_id) t1

SELECT risk_level as risk_level, COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(IF(tmp.`status` = 1, 1, 0)) AS compliance_count, SUM(IF(tmp.`status` = 2, 1, 0)) AS not_compliance_count FROM (SELECT MAX( compliance_scan_result.`status` ) AS `status`, compliance_rule.risk_level as risk_level FROM compliance_rule compliance_rule LEFT JOIN compliance_scan_result compliance_scan_result ON compliance_scan_result.compliance_rule_id = compliance_rule.id ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY compliance_rule.id, compliance_rule.risk_level) tmp GROUP BY tmp.risk_level
